 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיר‎</span>] **verb** ==flow== (like slime); — (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִירָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***saliva, spittle***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slaver slobber***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָר בְּשָׂרוֺ אֶתזֿוֺבוֺ‎</span> [[Lev.15.3|Lev 15:3]] ***his flesh*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּשָׂר‎</span> **3**) ***flows with his issue***.
